input_args.passage: 'Carl Wieland - Wikipedia | Dr. Carl Wieland (born 1950) is an Australian young earth creationist, author and speaker. He was the managing director of Creation Ministries International (formerly Answers in Genesis - Australia), a Creationist apologetics ministry. CMI are the distributors of Creation magazine and the Journal of Creation., Creation Ministries International'
input_args.claim: 'The beliefs of this organization are mentioned in context and, which state that CMI adheres to the young-earth creationist view, believing that the earth was created in six literal (24-hour) days, about 6,000–12,000 years ago.'
